attributes.action: ask Royal Mail to issue a set of stamps featuring John Craven, in recognition of his outstanding services and contributions to British life and culture.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A living British man-god, John Craven would be featured on the stamps wearing various jumpers and cardigans, and possibly sitting on a country fence by some cows.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
